attributes.additional_details:
A large number of terrible road traffic accidents with considerable damage to people's properties and parked vehicles.

Four major accidents in the last 18 months alone.
attributes.background:
Install speed bumps on Alcester Road, Studley, Warwickshire to prevent further damage to people's homes from speeding drivers.
Potential to save lives.

rejection.details:
We also can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
